summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 regarding prosecutors in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case seeking to contact an expert witness, Dr. [Redacted], for the upcoming trial. The email shows coordination between legal staff to obtain contact information.

persons.name: Ghisloine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the case United States v. Ghisloine Maxwell, with a trial scheduled for July 12, 2021. The name appears to be a misspelling of Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: S is a prosecutor working on the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Trial for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The trial for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled to begin on this date in the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: Prosecutors were actively preparing for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial in late 2021, seeking expert witnesses.
The trial for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 12, 2021.
The correspondence involves coordination to contact a specific doctor as a potential expert witness, though the name is redacted.
The document shows the ongoing legal process and trial preparation by the U.S. Attorney's office for the Southern District of New York.
